name: odoo
description: Odoo is an open-source suite of business apps including CRM, accounting, inventory, manufacturing, HR, and e-commerce. It can be self-hosted or used via SaaS with a powerful admin UI and thousands of modules.

features.title: Business Suite
features.description: Comprehensive ERP solution covering CRM, accounting, inventory, HR, and project management in one platform

features.title: Modular Architecture
features.description: Install only needed modules from thousands of available apps to customize functionality for specific business

features.title: Crm Integration
features.description: Manage leads, opportunities, and customer relationships with automated workflows and communication tracking

features.title: Accounting System
features.description: Handle invoicing, payments, financial reporting, and tax management with multi-currency support

features.title: Inventory Management
features.description: Track stock levels, manage warehouses, and automate procurement with barcode scanning capabilities

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Build online stores with integrated payment processing, shipping, and inventory synchronization

features.title: Manufacturing Tools
features.description: Plan production, manage bills of materials, and track work orders with quality control processes

features.title: Hr Management
features.description: Handle employee records, payroll, time tracking, and recruitment through integrated HR modules
